title: The Lost Duchess
description:
In the court of Queen Elizabeth, all a lady has is her reputation...And when that is lost, then so is she...
.An epic Elizabethan adventure from the acclaimed author of Mistress of the Sea, The Lost Duchess has a thriller's pace and a high tension love story that takes us from the palaces of England to the savage wilderness of the New World.
author: Jenny Barden
